title: Bloxd.io
description: A multiplayer voxel-based game offering various game modes including parkour, combat, and creative building. Play with friends in different themed worlds, each with unique objectives and mechanics. Features character customization and social elements in a colorful block environment.
how_to_play: Use WASD to move, Space to jump, and Shift to sprint. Left-click to interact with objects or attack, right-click to place blocks in creative mode. Press E to access inventory and Tab to view player list. Choose from different game modes like parkour challenges, PvP combat arenas, or creative building spaces.
